name: Stick Man War
description:
A local 2 - player fighting game with weird controls and gameplay

Player One

-----------------------------------------------------------

W ( Up attack ) D ( Forward Attack ) A ( Backward Attack ) S ( Down Attack ) Q ( Left ) E ( Right ) R ( Jump )

Player 2

------------------------------------------------------------

I ( Up Attack ) J ( Forward Attack ) L ( Backwards Attack ) K ( Down Attack ) U ( Right ) O ( Left ) Y ( Jump )
